skillTree.name: Giant Wolf
skillTree.description: "Da Big Boss getz da biggest barka', nuff sed."

skillTree.name: Giant Spider
skillTree.description: A quick Snotling sacrifice to da Spider-god gets the boss a fearsome mount.

skillTree.name: Ambusher
skillTree.description: This Boss is especially sneaky, able to deploy deep in enemy gits' terrain before battle.

skillTree.name: Da Nasty Skulker
skillTree.description: Like all nasty skulkers, dis Boss is "a bad piece o' work" – when he stabs he really means it.

skillTree.name: Stalker
skillTree.description: "I spy with my beady eye… something that needs to be killed."

skillTree.name: Dodgy Geezer
skillTree.description: You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Bloody Blade
skillTree.description: A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

skillTree.name: Gutter Fighter
skillTree.description: This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!

skillTree.name: Elusive
skillTree.description: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"

skillTree.name: Precise
skillTree.description: Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Opportunist
skillTree.description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…

skillTree.name: Counter-Striker
skillTree.description: The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Cornered Rat
skillTree.description: Never trap this one, when cornered they have nothing left to lose.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Bone Dagga
skillTree.description: Easy to use, fun to replace.

skillTree.name: Tricksta
skillTree.description: I'll cut ya, I'll bleed ya!

skillTree.name: Stunty Scrap
skillTree.description: Nuffin' gets past stunty armor like stunty metal.

skillTree.name: Crazed
skillTree.description: Yeah, I wouldn't get too near him if I was you.

skillTree.name: Shroomsin'
skillTree.description: Sometimes he stabs a gobbo or two by 'mistake', but he sure don't get tired.

effects.description:
Armour-Piercing Melee Damage: +1 for all Goblins, Squigs, Artillery and Spiders units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Hollerin'
skillTree.description: Maybe inspirational... maybe just annoying.

skillTree.name: Stick 'em Boyz!
skillTree.description: Da Boss says make 'em bleed.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +1 for infantry units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +2 for infantry units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +3 for infantry units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Troll Piss
skillTree.description: Yeah it smells bad, but so do you lot! Now douse yourselves, we gots a scrap ta win.

effects.description:
Melee attack: -1 for war beasts, monstrous infantry and Giant units
	(enemy armies in region)

Melee attack: -2 for war beasts, monstrous infantry and Giant units
	(enemy armies in region)

Melee attack: -3 for war beasts, monstrous infantry and Giant units
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Pillars of Poo
skillTree.description: Pooin' upwind is funny. Pooin' upstream is downright nasty.

effects.description:
Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -1%
	(enemy armies in province)

Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -2%
	(enemy armies in province)

Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -4%
	(enemy armies in province)

skillTree.name: Da Biggest Teef
skillTree.description: Look lads, it ain't gonna be easy. A lotta yoos gonna die. But that's a sacrifice I'm willin' to make.

effects.description:
Armour-Piercing Melee Damage: +1 for all Goblins, Squigs, Artillery and Spiders units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Organized
skillTree.description: The smiths have already completed their order, the workers are in position and the masons are ready to begin.

effects.description:
Construction time: -20% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Retinue: Disciple
skillTree.description: Useful, if a bit impetuous.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +1% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +6% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Retinue: Valet
skillTree.description: My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.name: Contacts
skillTree.description: Sometimes it’s best to have friends in low places.

skillTree.name: Shadow
skillTree.description: Always watching.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +2%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +2%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush success chance: +4%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +4%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush success chance: +8%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +8%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Grandmaster
skillTree.description: They’ve all heard the stories of this one’s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

effects.description:
Hero action success chance: +1%
	(all characters factionwide)

skillTree.name: Scavenge
skillTree.description: "I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Cleanse Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Big Bully
backgroundSkills.description: "Someday he's gonna be a Boss. Can you believe someday we'll work for 'im?"

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
	(all units in army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Bragga
backgroundSkills.description: When you're clearly betterer than all the uvvers you need to shout the loudest, so everybody else knows you're the betterest.

backgroundSkills.name: Mushroom-Addicted
backgroundSkills.description: "Dat a 'shroom in yer pouch? Give it! Give it to me!"

effects.description:
Upkeep: -8% for Goblin and Night Goblin units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Serial Danca
backgroundSkills.description: You can't keep a good 'danca' down, especially when those drums start bangin'!

effects.description:
Leadership: -5 for enemy Lords and embedded Heroes
	(enemy armies in region)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

backgroundSkills.name: Tortura
backgroundSkills.description: When a Warboss needs someone to talk, he calls on this "Boy wiv da extra pointy sticks".

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Shroom Growa’
backgroundSkills.description: Da boyz prefer teef, but enjoy some quality ‘shrooms when the mood strikes.

backgroundSkills.name: Shiny Lova’
backgroundSkills.description: Oi, listen up yooz gits. Bring da shiniest bits back to me… or else.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%

backgroundSkills.name: Night Gobbo Loon
backgroundSkills.description: I love da dark places. Yoo can ‘ave so much fun with dem stunties in da dark...

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

Leadership: +5 during subterranean intercept battles
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Bearded Choppas
backgroundSkills.description: It just sorta happened. After a few scraps, da stuntie’s beard-hairs were stickin’ to my choppas.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dwarfs

backgroundSkills.name: Beard Connoisseur
backgroundSkills.description: Whoeva’ brings me da best beard after da scrap gets a necklace o’ teef from my personal stash.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 when fighting against Dwarfs
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Choppa Envy
backgroundSkills.description: "Dere choppa's bigga dan mine."

backgroundSkills.name: Stabba Envy
backgroundSkills.description: "Dat stabba is longa dan mine!"
